Name: Candy Snake Master
About the game: Maybe the most addictive snake game ever. Help baby snake eat candies and become more stronger, all mystery power-ups are your best friends, they can help you and give you more power to fight against those aggressive snakes. This game includes an adventure mode, a time trial and a challenge mode. This is a great game for any aged players. I promise you will love it in 5 minutes. Features Three game mode: Adventure, time trial and challenge. Four different game scenes, 21 unique game levels. Play is very simply, only need move your mouse. Exciting game music and 3D sound effects. View more videos at Official Site: /
